thread.title: AP source: Don Mattingly out as LA Dodgers manager
thread.title_full: AP source: Don Mattingly out as LA Dodgers manager

author: Beth Harris AP Sports Writer
title: AP source: Don Mattingly out as LA Dodgers manager
text: Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 10:33 AM Updated Oct 22, 2015 at 10:35 AM By Beth Harris Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 10:33 AM Updated Oct 22, 2015 at 10:35 AM » Social News LOS ANGELES (AP) — A person familiar with the decision tells The Associated Press that Don Mattingly is out as manager of the Los Angeles Dodgers. The person spoke on the condition of anonymity Thursday because the team has not announced his departure. Mattingly, who had managed the team for five years, agreed with the Dodgers to mutually part ways, the person said. Front office officials are expected to address his departure at a news conference later Thursday. Los Angeles was 446-363 under Mattingly, finishing with a winning record in every season and winning the last three NL West titles. But the Dodgers have not reached the World Series since winning the title in 1988. The 54-year-old former Yankees star ranks sixth in wins among Dodgers managers. By Beth Harris
